full_summary:
**Online Digital Engagement**
===============

**Call Number:** cb-795-66925075

**Amended Solicitation Number**: 24062-24-283 (amended)

**Publication Date**: April 17, 2024

**Closing Date**: May 21, 2024, at 14:00:00

**Expected Contract Start Date**: June 3, 2024

**Expected Contract End Date**: May 31, 2026

**Contract Status**: Tender Status - Expired

**Category**: SRV

**Procurement Method**: Competitive

**Type of Procurement**: Request for Proposal

**Trade Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and others. (See list below)

**Contracting Entity**: Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat

**Contact Information**:
| Name | Dawn Dormer |
| Email | dawn.dormer@tbs-sct.gc.ca |
| Phone | 343542-8102 |

**Description**: The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat's Regulatory Affairs Sector seeks a digital platform for online engagement and corresponding services to facilitate interactions between stakeholders, members of the public, and government officials across Canada.

**Regions**: This opportunity is open to suppliers with a presence in the National Capital Region (NCR) or able to provide equivalent services to this region.

**Note**: The amended tender includes various technical attachments, including questions and answers series 2, 3, and a revised solicitation.

List of Trade Agreements:

*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

The rewritten text  abolished paragraphs fused multiple sentences into  ones, removed extraneous lines of data. Eligibly changed }}
